::Symphony/Composer::

     Symphony walked around Maximal City.  He walked=
 around the training area.  But he wasn't thinking about training.  No, man=
y other thoughts and questions were shooting through his mind.  Symphony wo=
ndered if he had the courage to attack one of his former fellow Maximals.  =
Was he bad enough to be a Decepticon?  Was it possible?  Was Symphony too k=
ind, too gentle for this?  Could he ditch his personality and his friends? =
 Was it all worth it?  He didn't know what to think...Symphony then heard v=
oices and stuff down in a dark hall.  Symphony ran down there.  He might be=
 able to get into action here...

     "What's going on?" Symphony asked.
~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     Composer s=
macked his hands together a few times after unloading all the parts and scr=
aps from his pod into ER5.  

     "Zardus, I have completed taking the stu=
ff to Equipment Room 5.  Do you have any other tasks for me to commence?" C=
omposer asked, through his comm-link.



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~Lur=
kerAbyss~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~The Keeper Of Souls~
~The Shadow O=
f The Dark~
~I Am The Lurker Of The Abyss~
